backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence entries mapping SEO and content updates to specific frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Lists short summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder with no content.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting global metadata, favicon, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Allows all user agents and points to the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing the homepage and all major tool and info page URLs.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React routing and layout file defining navigation, priority tools, SEO hooks, and page routes.
frontend/src/components/AdPlaceholder.ts: Empty component that renders nothing to prevent ads from appearing.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a refresh prompt.
frontend/src/components/tools/LoadingInd: Simple loading spinner with optional text.
frontend/src/components/tools/RelatedToo: Displays related tool cards excluding the current tool with icons and links.
Reusable layout wrapper for tool pages providing inputs, actions, loading states, results, and downloads.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static page describing SankalpHub's mission and list of offered tools.
frontend/src/pages/AllToolsPage.tsx: Displays a grid of all available tools with icons, descriptions, and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/CalculatorsPage.tsx: Shows a categorized list of calculator tools with icons and routes.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides contact information and support details for SankalpHub users.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage featuring a hero section, tool categories, and highlights of platform features.
frontend/src/pages/ImageToolsPage.tsx: Lists image-related tools and renders clickable cards linking to their routes.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with navigation buttons to the homepage and all tools.
frontend/src/pages/PdfToolsPage.tsx: Shows a grid of PDF tools with icons and links to their respective routes.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the site's privacy policy with sections on data handling, security, cookies, and updates.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Provides the site's terms of service, including usage rules, disclaimers, and liability limits.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Age: Implements an age calculator that computes years, months, and days from a birth date using ToolShell.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Bmi: Calculates BMI and displays the health category with color coding and reference ranges.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Emi: Calculates EMI, total payment, and interest for loans and displays results in a structured layout.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Gst: Provides a GST calculator UI allowing users to add or remove GST and displays computed GST and totals.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Loa: Implements a loan calculator that computes monthly payment, total payment, and interest based on inputs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Per: Offers tools to calculate percentage values and percentage change with tab-based UI and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/tools/calculators/Sip: Builds a SIP calculator that computes maturity value, invested amount, and gains using monthly investment inputs.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageComp: Provides an image compression tool that compresses images at adjustable quality and allows downloading results.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageConv: Implements an image converter that transforms uploaded images into JPEG, PNG, or WebP formats and enables download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/ImageResi: React page for resizing images with custom dimensions, aspect-ratio toggle, and download support.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/JpgToPngP: Provides JPG-to-PNG image conversion with file validation, processing state, and download output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/image/PngToJpgP: UI for converting PNG images to JPG, showing upload, progress, success message, and download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/CompressPdf: PDF compression page that uploads a PDF, runs a compression utility, displays a summary, and enables download.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/ImageToPdfP: Converts multiple image files into a single PDF with processing indicators and download option.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/JpgToPdfPag: ToolShell-based JPG-to-PDF converter handling multiple images, demo-mode warnings, and downloadable output.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfMergePag: UI page for merging multiple PDFs using mergePdfs and enabling download of the merged result.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfSplitPag: UI page for splitting a PDF by page range using splitPdf and downloading the extracted pages.
frontend/src/pages/tools/pdf/PdfToImageP: UI page for converting a PDF into images via pdfToImage and downloading the generated ZIP.
frontend/src/routes.ts: Defines all frontend route constants for navigation including tool-specific paths.
frontend/src/utils/calculators.ts: Utility functions for age, GST, EMI, loan, and BMI calculations with validation.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Provides helpers to trigger Blob downloads and generate timestamped filenames.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formatting utilities for bytes, numbers, and percentage reduction.
frontend/src/utils/image.ts: Image processing utilities for loading, compressing, resizing, and format conversion.
frontend/src/utils/pdf.ts: Provides demo placeholder implementations for creating, merging, splitting, compressing PDFs, and converting PDFs to images using simulated delays and text-based Blob outputs.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Manages page SEO by setting document titles and meta descriptions, including predefined metadata for key tool routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/VERIFICATION_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist verifying required tool URLs, SEO metadata, navigation, and crawlability.
project_state.json: Project metadata containing schema info, feature definitions, and pending requests related to updating EMI Calculator page SEO and content.
